incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Backup as a Service] - Veeam Enterprise incident notification

incident_updates.body:
instances in EU regions have been fixed.
Remaining ones in CA region are scheduled for the beginning of next week.

affected_components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Enterprise

incident_updates.body:
The update is scheduled for the end of next week. Until then, we recommend that you do not update your Veeam enterprise or you will no longer be able to log in.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

affected_components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Enterprise

incident_updates.body:
Our technical teams are working on the fix which will be implemented in the coming weeks.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

affected_components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Enterprise

incident_updates.body: Start time : 04/09/2024 14:00 UTC Service impact : Customers who upgrade their Veeam servers to the latest version, won't be able to connect to our Veeam Enterprise, but they will be protected by the current license. Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are preparing a fix to solve the issue.

affected_components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Enterprise

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 23/09/2024 14:00 UTC End time : 23/09/2024 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 30/09/2024 07:00 UTC End time : 04/10/2024 15:00 UTC Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins. Thank you for your understanding.
